content: Leave blank to use default header

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a subtitle that explains the usage of an authentication header when leaving it blank. It is used in a UI element where users can configure document service settings, and appears as a tooltip or label for clarity. The text prompts users to leave the header blank if they wish to use the default header setting.

usage.context: onChange={onChangeAuthHeader} isDisabled={isSaveLoading || isResetLoading} dataTestId="auth_header_input_block" /> {t("Settings:DocumentServiceAuthHeaderSubtitle")}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Standart başlığı istifadə etmək üçün boş buraxın.' is a literal translation but may not be the most natural way to express the meaning in Azerbaijani. It could be improved to better reflect the original intent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Boş qoyub default başlığı istifadə edin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Jätä tyhjäksi käyttääksesi oletusotsikkoa' is a bit awkward and not the most natural way to express 'Leave blank to use default header' in Finnish. A more fluent translation would be something like 'Jätä tyhjäksi käyttääksesi oletusarvoista otsikkoa' or 'Jätä tyhjäksi käyttämään oletusotsikkoa'.
The translation "Թողեք դատարկ՝ լռելյայն վերնագիրը օգտագործելու համար" is a literal translation and sounds awkward in Armenian. A more natural phrasing would be needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Մի լրացրեք՝ օգտագործելու համար ընտրյալ վերնագիրը

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The hyphen in "լռելյայն վերնագիրը- օգտագործելու համար" creates an unnecessary pause. It is not standard Armenian punctuation.
The word 'ເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ' is a bit formal for this context. A more natural phrasing might be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປ່ອຍຫວ່າງໄວ້ເພື່ອໃຊ້ສ່ວນຫົວຄ່າເລີ່ມຕົ້ນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Lăsați spațiu necompletat pentru a folosi antetul implicit' is a literal translation and a bit awkward in Romanian. A more natural phrasing would be 'Lăsați câmpul gol pentru a folosi antetul implicit' or 'Lăsați câmpul liber pentru a folosi antetul implicit'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lăsați câmpul gol pentru a folosi antetul implicit

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ශීර්ෂකය හිස්වල් තැබීම පෙරනිතිගත ශීර්ෂකය භාවිතා කිරීමට ඉඩ දීම' is a bit literal and slightly awkward. A more natural and concise translation would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ශීර්ෂකය හිස්තැබුවහ පෙරනිතිගත ශීර්ෂකය යොදාගත හැකිය.
